attributes.action: Antisocial Residents removed so residents no longer bullied,at risk & happier
attributes.additional_details: We are experiencing unprecedented levels of theft, drug/alcohol abuse which result in the damage to the way we are having to live &keeping children from playing outside in the communal area,which is provided by RBK.We are continually having the amenity of quiet enjoyment of our homes taken away from us, by two residents,who through their determination to carry on this form of existence affecting all of the residents,who wish to live their lives with decent behaviour& within guidelines set by RBK
attributes.background: Vile verbal abuse shouted to each other,Verbal abuse shouted at other residents including children.We all feel they shouldn't be around children,Drug abuse,Alcohol abuse,Thieving,Bullying,Drug dealing,Threatening behaviour,Visitors to them are intimidating,Scrounging

rejection.details:
These decisions are for local councils to make. You could raise this issue with your local councillors. You can find out who they are here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

Many local councils have their own petitions website for local issues. This would be a more effective way of raising this issue.
